sources.name: csv_clientes
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  csv_clientes

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared csv_clientes = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://blobstoragerjz.blob.core.windows.net/input/clientes.txt"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  #"Columnas con nombre cambiado" = Table.RenameColumns(Csv, {{"Column1", "id"}, {"Column2", "name"}, {"Column3", "type"}})
in
  #"Columnas con nombre cambiado";
